        what - The Type of Info or Warning.
        extra - An Extra Code, Specific to the Info. Typically Implementation Dependent.

      • onKeyboardInput

        void onKeyboardInput(POIHsmManage secMgr,
                     int numKeys)
        Called When the Ped Pinblock Module Should Show UI with TP as Softkeys.
        Button Input Value, Input Return Value is Defined as Follows:
        Parameters:
        secMgr - POIHsmManage Object.
        numKeys - Input Number Keys.
        0xN : returns 0xN keys correctly.

      • onKeyboardShow

        void onKeyboardShow(POIHsmManage secMgr,
                    byte[] keys,
                    int timeoutMs)
        Called When the Ped Pinblock Module Should Show UI With TP as Softkeys.
        Keys:E.g BCD 38 35 37 36 30 32 39 31 33 1B 34 0D.
        The Keyboard Sequence is Displayed According to the Keys Parameter.

      • onPedKeyManageRet

        void onPedKeyManageRet(POIHsmManage secMgr,
                       int ret)
        Called When PasswordManage Async Called Result Returned.

      • onPedPinBlockRet

        void onPedPinBlockRet(POIHsmManage secMgr,
                      int type,
                      byte[] pinBuf)
        Called When the Ped Pinblock Should show UI With TP as Softkeys.
        Parameters:
        secMgr - POIHsmManage Object.
        type - Pinblock Default or Psam.
        0x86 : Cipher Text PIN (PED_VERIFY_PIN_TYPE_CIPHER)
        0x87 : Plain Text PIN (PED_VERIFY_PIN_TYPE_PLAIN)
        pinBuf -

      • onPedVerifyPin

        void onPedVerifyPin(POIHsmManage secMgr,
                    int type,
                    byte[] rspBuf)
        Called When Ped Verity Pin Return.
        PIN Verification, Support for Offline Ciphertext PIN, Offline Plaintext PIN.
        Parameters:
        secMgr - POIHsmManage Object.
        type - Plain or Encrypt.
        rspBuf -
